text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS What a joke? Are you delusional? Do you really think the American public doesn’t know better? Your statement about President Obama is an out right lie. Why can’t you focus on COVID-19 ?Soon 200,000 Americans will have died. We don’t care about golf. We need a leader. God help us
